data_table.description: Aortic Valve/Mitral Valve Calcium Score Data, Offspring Cohort Exam 7. Data collected include number of aortic and mitral valve lesions, aortic and mitral valve calcium scores, volumes scores for aortic and mitral valves, and mean of the aortic and mitral valve scores.

variable.name: SCORE1
variable.description: AORTIC VALVE CALCIUM SCORE - FIRST SCAN. MULTIPLE OBSERVERS MAY HAVE COMPLETED THIS SCORE.
variable.comment: SOME PARTICIPANTS MAY HAVE MULTIPLE RECORDS THAT CORRESPOND TO DIFFERENT INTERPRETERS.

variable.name: SCORE2
variable.description: MITRAL VALVE CALCIUM SCORE - FIRST SCAN. MULTIPLE OBSERVERS MAY HAVE COMPLETED THIS SCORE.
variable.comment: SOME PARTICIPANTS MAY HAVE MULTIPLE RECORDS THAT CORRESPOND TO DIFFERENT INTERPRETERS.

variable.name: SCORE4
variable.description: AORTIC VALVE CALCIUM SCORE - SECOND SCAN. MULTIPLE OBSERVERS MAY HAVE COMPLETED THIS SCORE.
variable.comment: SOME PARTICIPANTS MAY HAVE MULTIPLE RECORDS THAT CORRESPOND TO DIFFERENT INTERPRETERS.

variable.name: SCORE5
variable.description: MITRAL VALVE CALCIUM SCORE - SECOND SCAN. MULTIPLE OBSERVERS MAY HAVE COMPLETED THIS SCORE.
variable.comment: SOME PARTICIPANTS MAY HAVE MULTIPLE RECORDS THAT CORRESPOND TO DIFFERENT INTERPRETERS.

variable.name: MEAN1
variable.description: MEAN OF THE AORTIC VALVE SCORE (FROM MULTIPLE OBSERVERS) - FIRST SCAN
variable.comment: SOME PARTICIPANTS MAY HAVE MULTIPLE RECORDS THAT CORRESPOND TO DIFFERENT INTERPRETERS.

variable.name: MEAN2
variable.description: MEAN OF THE MITRAL VALVE SCORE (FROM MULTIPLE OBSERVERS) - FIRST SCAN
variable.comment: SOME PARTICIPANTS MAY HAVE MULTIPLE RECORDS THAT CORRESPOND TO DIFFERENT INTERPRETERS.

variable.name: MEAN4
variable.description: MEAN OF THE AORTIC VALVE SCORE (FROM MULTIPLE OBSERVERS) - SECOND SCAN
variable.comment: SOME PARTICIPANTS MAY HAVE MULTIPLE RECORDS THAT CORRESPOND TO DIFFERENT INTERPRETERS.

variable.name: MEAN5
variable.description: MEAN OF THE MITRAL VALVE SCORE (FROM MULTIPLE OBSERVERS) - SECOND SCAN
variable.comment: SOME PARTICIPANTS MAY HAVE MULTIPLE RECORDS THAT CORRESPOND TO DIFFERENT INTERPRETERS.

variable.name: INID1
variable.description: INTERPRETER ID AORTIC VALVE - FIRST SCAN

variable.name: INID2
variable.description: INTERPRETER ID MITRAL VALVE - FIRST SCAN

variable.name: INID4
variable.description: INTERPRETER ID AORTIC VALVE - SECOND SCAN

variable.name: INID5
variable.description: INTERPRETER ID MITRAL VALVE - SECOND SCAN

variable.name: ctdate
variable.description: DATE OF CT SCAN, NUMBER OF DAYS SINCE EXAM 1
